attributes.action: refuse to allow Germany to attend meetings of the UN Security Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Germany is not one of the five permanent members of the UN Security Council and so has no business sitting in on its meetings; it is therefore alarming to see the Germans present whenever the permanent members of the Security Council ('P5') convene on delicate matters such as Iran. Why should Germany receive special privileges, after two world wars fought against them in which they were the aggressors?
